generalInfo.briefDescription: The Indian Space Research Organisation recruits Vasu on a special mission. He along with his team must stop an asteroid, advancing towards Earth, from causing damage and destruction.
generalInfo.alterDescription: சென்னை எண்ணூர் அருகே நள்ளிரவில் திடீரென ஒரு விண்வெளி கல் விழுந்து பலர் இறந்துவிடுகின்றனர். ஆனால் அதைவிட 100 மடங்கு விண்வெளி கல் ஒன்று பூமியை நோக்கி வந்து கொண்டிருப்பதாகவும், அந்த விண்கல், தென்னிந்தியாவில் விழும் வாய்ப்பு இருப்பதாகவும், அவ்வாறு விழுந்தால் இந்திய வரைபடமே மாறிவிடும் என்பதையும் இந்திய ராணுவம் கண்டுபிடிக்கின்றது. விண்வெளியிலேயே அதை இரண்டாக பிளந்து சிதறடிக்க வேண்டும் என்பதுதான் ராணுவத்தினர்களின் திட்டம். ஆனால் அந்த விண்கல்லை சிதறடிக்க வேண்டுமானால் அதற்கு அதிகபட்ச அணுசக்தி வேண்டும். பூமியில் உள்ள எந்த நாட்டிடமும் அவ்வளவு அணுசக்தி இல்லை. ஆனால் சீனா, அந்த அணுசக்தியை விண்வெளியில் மறைத்து வைத்துள்ளது. அந்த அணுசக்தியை திருடி, விண்கல்லை சிதறடிக்க வேண்டும் அதுவும் ஏழே நாட்களில் என்ற இலக்குடன் கிளம்புகிறது ஜெயம் ரவி டீம். இந்த முயற்சிக்கு வெற்றி கிடைத்ததா? இல்லையா/ என்பதே இந்த படத்தின் மீதிக்கதை.
generalInfo.title: Tik Tik Tik
generalInfo.description: The Indian Space Research Organisation recruits Vasu on a special mission. He along with his team must stop an asteroid, advancing towards Earth, from causing damage and destruction.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Kamal, a young man, travels to Chennai to save his ancestral property from getting demolished. Later, he comes across Boopathi, a corrupt chief minister, who is behind the demolition of the property.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ஒரு இளைஞன் தனது மூதாதையர் சொத்தை காப்பாற்ற நகரம் வருகிறார்,ஒரு ஊழல்வாதியான முதல்வர் எதிர்ப்பாகா இருக்கிறார்,அவரை எப்படி வெற்றிகொள்கிறார்.
generalInfo.title: Saguni
generalInfo.description: Kamal, a young man, travels to Chennai to save his ancestral property from getting demolished. Later, he comes across Boopathi, a corrupt chief minister, who is behind the demolition of the property.

values.description: Suitable for all age viewers

values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: Yama attempts to save an innocent child and accidentally rescues a corrupt politician along with her. Lord Shiva, who is furious about Yama's mistake, gives him an ultimatum to amend the situation.
generalInfo.alterDescription: பல லட்சம் ஆண்டுகள் எமனாகப் பணியாற்றிய ராதாரவி, ஓய்வுபெறும் முடிவுக்கு வருகிறார். அவருக்குப் பதிலாக அவரின் வாரிசு யோகிபாபுவிடம் எமன் பணியை ஒப்படைக்கிறார். இது ஏற்கெனவே, எமன் பதவிமீது கண் வைத்திருந்த சித்திரகுப்தனின் கண்களைக் கலங்கவைக்கிறது. அந்த அரியணையில் உட்கார பூலோகத்து அரசியல் சாணக்கியர் ஒருவரிடம் அறிவுரை கேட்டு, அவர் சொன்னதுபோல் தப்புக்கணக்கு எழுதுகிறார். தப்புக்கணக்கால் நிகழும் தாறுமாறு தர்பார்தான் கதை.
generalInfo.title: Dharmaprabhu
generalInfo.description: Yama attempts to save an innocent child and accidentally rescues a corrupt politician along with her. Lord Shiva, who is furious about Yama's mistake, gives him an ultimatum to amend the situation.

values.description: Suitable for all age viewers
values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: Samayan receives a call from a stranger who keeps threatening him by saying that he will be killed within a duration of one week. Later, Samayan decides to pursue the stranger on his own.
generalInfo.alterDescription: திண்டுக்கல்லில் மளிகைக் கடை நடத்தும் சமையனுக்கு (வசுமித்ரா) ஒரு செல்போன் அழைப்பு வருகிறது.ஒரு வாரத்துக்கு அப்புறம் உயிரோட இருக்கமாட்டே என்று மிரட்டுகிறது எதிர்முனை குரல். சமையன் பதற்றமாகிறார். அந்தக் குரலுக்குச் சொந்தக்காரனான சசிகுமார், அவரைக் கொல்வதற்காக துரத்திக்கொண்டே இருக்கிறார்.  இருவருக்கும் இடையே துரத்தல், மோதல், ஆவேசம், ரவுத்திரம் என கலந்துகட்டி, காட்சிக்கு காட்சி பரபரப்பைக் கூட்டுகிறார்கள். கடைசியில், சசிகுமார் ஏன் சமையனை துரத்துகிறார்? அவரைக் கொன்றாரா? என்பதை வழக்கமான ரத்த வாடையோடு வித்தியாசமாகச் சொல்கிறது அசுரவதம்.
generalInfo.title: Asuravadham
generalInfo.description: Samayan receives a call from a stranger who keeps threatening him by saying that he will be killed within a duration of one week. Later, Samayan decides to pursue the stranger on his own.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Meera, a happy-go-lucky radio jockey, falls for Varun in a very unusual way. However, they must overcome many obstacles, including their different perspectives on life, to be together.
generalInfo.alterDescription: మీరా, ఒక హ్యాపీ-లక్కీ రేడియో జాకీ, చాలా అసాధారణమైన రీతిలో వరుణ్ కి  దగ్గర అవుతుంది. ఏదేమైనప్పటికీ, వారు జీవితంలో వారి విభిన్న దృక్పథాలతో సహా, చాలా అడ్డంకులను అధిగమించాలి, కలిసి ఉండలి.
generalInfo.title: Naa Nuvve
generalInfo.description: Meera, a happy-go-lucky radio jockey, falls for Varun in a very unusual way. However, they must overcome many obstacles, including their different perspectives on life, to be together.

values.description: Suitable for all age viewers

values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: When Santosh, a flirt, falls for Geeta, she challenges him to stay in a girl's hostel and not flirt with anyone. However, when he decides to confront her, he learns that she has left him.
generalInfo.alterDescription: జల్సా జీవితానికి అలవాటుపడి అనేకమంది అమ్మాయిలతో సన్నిహిత సంబంధాలు కలిగి ఉన్న సంతోష్ కి,గీత తో పరిచయమై ప్రేమగా మారుతుంది.గీతను ఏవిధంగానైనా తన ప్రేమలో పడేయాలని సంతోష్ చేసిన ప్రయత్నాల వలన విసిగి వేసారిన గీత అతనికి ఒక సవాల్ విసురుతుంది.పదిరోజులపాటు మహిళల వసతి గృహంలో గడపాలని మరియు ఏ మహిళనూ లోబర్చుకోరాదనేదే ఆ సవాల్.ఆమె సవాల్ స్వీకరించిన అతడు ఒక మహిళా వసతి గృహంలో ప్రవేశించి సహనం కోల్పోకుండా పది రోజులు గడుపుతాడు.గీత దగ్గరికి వెళ్ళి ఆమెను ఒప్పించాలనుకొనే అతడికి,గీత గురించి కొన్ని చేదు నిజాలు తెలుస్తాయి.అసలు గీత ఎవరు?ఆమె నేపథ్యం ఏమిటి? చివరికి వారిద్దరూ ఒక్కటయ్యారా లేదా? అనేది మిగిలిన కథ.
generalInfo.title: Saradaga Ammayitho
generalInfo.description: When Santosh, a flirt, falls for Geeta, she challenges him to stay in a girl's hostel and not flirt with anyone. However, when he decides to confront her, he learns that she has left him.

values.name: Sri Chakra Innovations and Rushi Media

generalInfo.briefDescription: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ప్రాచీనమైన �మరకతమణి� అనే వజ్రాన్ని దొంగలించాలని ప్రయత్నించిన ప్రతి ఒక్కరు అంతుపట్టని రీతిలో చనిపోతుంటారు. అలాంటి సమయంలోనే చిన్న స్మగ్లర్ అయిన ఆది ముందుకొచ్చి ఆ వజ్రాన్ని దొగలించడానికి సిద్దమవుతాడు. అలా జీవితాన్ని రిస్కులో పెట్టిన ఆదికి ఒక పూజారి వజ్రాన్ని దొంగిలించే ప్రయత్నంలో ప్రాణాలు కోల్పోకుండా ఉండటానికి దుష్ట శక్తుల సహాయం తీసుకోమని చెబుతాడు. పూజారి సలహా ప్రకారం ఆది ఎలాంటి దుష్ట శక్తుల్ని మేల్కొలిపాడు ? ఆదుష్ట శక్తుల సహాయంతో ఆ వజ్రాన్ని ఎలా దొంగిలించాడు ? అనేదే కథాంశం.
generalInfo.title: Marakathamani
generalInfo.description: Senguttuvan and Elango are hired by a jewel smuggler to find a cursed treasure responsible for the death of many. Later, with the help of a priest, they summon three spirits to locate the treasure.

values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: Catherine and Aishwarya, co-passengers on a plane journey, become friends and share their love stories. Catherine is shocked when she learns that the man she is dating resembles Aishwarya's fiance.
generalInfo.alterDescription: లండన్ నుంచి తిరిగి వస్తూ...విమానంలో పక్క పక్కనే కూర్చుని ఫ్రెండ్స్ గా మారతారు కేథరిన్‌,ఐశ్వర్య.తమ తమ ప్రేమ కథలను ఒకరికొకరు చెప్పుకుంటారు.ఇంతలో కేథరిన్ కు తన ప్రియుడు గౌతమ్ చనిపోయాడని తెలుస్తుంది.కానీ ఓ జర్నలిస్ట్ ద్వారా అతను చనిపోలేదు..చంపబడ్డాడు అని తెలుసుకుంటుంది.మరో ప్రక్క ఐశ్వర్యకి కాబోయే భర్త జై కూడా అదే పోలికలతో ఉండటంతో,కేథరిన్‌కు అతని పై అనుమానం వస్తుంది.కొన్ని ఆధారాల కొరకు జై ని వెంబడించడంలో కొన్ని నిజాలు బయటపడతాయి.ఏమిటా నిజాలు ? గౌతమ్ ని చంపింది ఎవరు ? ఏవిధంగా గౌతమ్ చంపబడ్డాడు ? అనేదే కథాంశం.
generalInfo.title: Gentleman (2016)
generalInfo.description: Catherine and Aishwarya, co-passengers on a plane journey, become friends and share their love stories. Catherine is shocked when she learns that the man she is dating resembles Aishwarya's fiance.

values.description: Suitable for all age viewers
values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: Surya,a juvenile offender,completes his education in prison and upon release embarks on his dream project.However,he has to overcome numerous obstacles to turn his dream into a reality.
generalInfo.alterDescription: చిన్నప్పడే తల్లి తండ్రులను కోల్పోయిన సూర్యని ఆటోనగర్ లోని మెకానిక్ చేరదీస్తాడు.అయితే అక్కడున్న పరిస్ధితులకి ఎదురుతిరిగి హత్యానేరంలో ఇరుక్కుని చిన్నవయస్సులోనే జైలుకు వెళతాడు.జైలర్ సహాయంతో జైలులో చదువుకుని విడుదలై ఆటోనగర్ కి వచ్చిన సూర్య తన తెలివి ఉపయోగించి బ్యాటరీతో కారు తయారు చేయాలనుకుంటాడు.కానీ ఇప్పుడు ఆటోనగర్ ని మేయర్ అండతో ఇంద్ర,అజయ్ లు శాసిస్తుంటారు.ఆటోనగర్ లో ఏం చేయాలన్నా వారి అనుమతి కావాలి.అలాంటి పరిస్ధితుల్లో సూర్య ఏం చేసాడు? అసలు ఇంద్రకు మేయర్ కు ఉన్న సంబంధంఏమిటి ? సూర్యకి మేయర్ పై గల వ్యక్తిగత కక్ష ఏమిటి? అనేదే కథాంశం.
generalInfo.title: Auto Nagar Surya
generalInfo.description: Surya,a juvenile offender,completes his education in prison and upon release embarks on his dream project.However,he has to overcome numerous obstacles to turn his dream into a reality.

values.title: Suitable for viewers age above 13 only

generalInfo.briefDescription: Roy and his friends expose the misdeeds of Sahadevan, a corrupt politician, and soon the friends are found murdered. Later, when Roy dies of an illness, Jayan discovers Roy and Sahadevan's past.
generalInfo.alterDescription: വിവിധ രാഷ്ട്രീയ ആശയങ്ങള്‍ വച്ചുപുലര്‍ത്തുന്ന മൂന്നു പേരിലൂടെയാണ് ചിത്രത്തിന്‍റെ കഥ മുന്നോട് പോകുന്നത്ബാല്യവും അനുഭവസമ്പത്തും വീക്ഷണങ്ങളും എങ്ങനെ അവരെ നിലവിലെ ആശയങ്ങളില്‍ എത്തിച്ചു എന്ന് ചിത്രം കാഴ്ചക്കാരന് കാണിച്ചു തരുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: Left Right Left
generalInfo.description: Roy and his friends expose the misdeeds of Sahadevan, a corrupt politician, and soon the friends are found murdered. Later, when Roy dies of an illness, Jayan discovers Roy and Sahadevan's past.

values.description: Suitable for all age viewers
values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: A transgender man struggles to realise his sexual orientation while dealing with the social stigma and taboo related to gender transformation in the society.
generalInfo.alterDescription: അനേകം മാനസിക സംഘര്‍ഷത്തിന് ഒടുവിൽ മാത്തുക്കുട്ടി ശസ്ത്രക്രിയ നടത്തി, മേരിക്കുട്ടി എന്ന ഒരു സ്ത്രീയായി മാറുന്നു. അവിടെ നിന്ന് അങ്ങോട്ട് അവൾക്ക് സമൂഹത്തിൽ ആദരപൂർണ്ണമായ ഒരു വ്യക്തിത്വവും, അവളുടെ സ്വപ്നവും  കൈവരിക്കാൻ പലവിധ  തടസ്സങ്ങൾ നേരിടേണ്ടിവരുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: Njan Marykutty
generalInfo.description: A transgender man struggles to realise his sexual orientation while dealing with the social stigma and taboo related to gender transformation in the society.

values.description: Suitable for all age viewers
values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: Derick Abraham, an honest police officer, reluctantly arrests his brother, Philip, who is accused of murdering his lover.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ഡെറിക് അബ്രഹാം ഒരു സത്യസന്ധനായ പോലീസ് ഓഫീസർ ആണ്. ഡെറിക്ക്ന്   അയാളുടെ സഹോദരനായ ഫിലിപ്പിനെ കാമുകിയെ വധിച്ച കുറ്റത്തിന് അറസ്റ്റ് ചെയ്യേണ്ടി വരുന്നു. പക്ഷെ ഫിലിപ്പ് കുറ്റക്കാരനല്ല എന്ന് ഡെറിക്ക്ന് പിന്നീട് മനസ്സിലാകുന്നു. അതോടെ അയാൾ തൻ്റെ സഹോദരനെ ജയിലിൽ നിന്ന് രക്ഷപ്പെടുത്താൻ ശ്രമിക്കുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: Abrahaminte Santhathikal
generalInfo.description: Derick Abraham, an honest police officer, reluctantly arrests his brother, Philip, who is accused of murdering his lover.

values.title: Suitable for viewers age above 13 only

generalInfo.briefDescription: Alby and Sara start facing financial problems after they get married. In order to make ends meet, Alby thoughtlessly commits a crime, which leads to many problems.
generalInfo.alterDescription: അത്യുത്സാഹിയായ ഒരു സിനിമാ സംവിധായകന്‍ ആണ് ആല്‍ബി. സാമ്പത്തികമായ ബാധ്യതകള്‍ ആല്‍ബിയെ ഒരു വീണ്ടുവിചാരമില്ലാത്ത പ്രവര്‍ത്തി ചെയ്യാന്‍ പ്രേരിപ്പിക്കുന്നു. അത് ആല്‍ബിയുടെ ജീവിതത്തിന്‍റെ താളം തെറ്റിക്കുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: Oru Cinemakkaran
generalInfo.description: Alby and Sara start facing financial problems after they get married. In order to make ends meet, Alby thoughtlessly commits a crime, which leads to many problems.

values.title: Suitable for all age viewers

generalInfo.briefDescription: Gowtham and his college friends tread different paths after an untoward incident makes him antisocial. His parents then try to contact his friends in order to help him.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ഒരു എഞ്ചിനീയറിംഗ് കോളേജിൽ ഒത്തു പഠിച്ച, കൂട്ടുകാരായ  ഗൗതം, ജ്യോതിസ്, റെക്സി, സുബഹൻ എന്നിവരുടെ കഥ വിവരിക്കുന്ന ചിത്രമാണ് റോൾ മോഡൽസ്. കോളേജിൽ വച്ച് നടന്ന ഒരു സംഭവം അവരെ നാലുപേരേയും വേർപിരിക്കുന്നു. കുറച്ചു വർഷങ്ങൾക്കുശേഷം,  ഗൗതം സ്‌നേഹിക്കുന്ന ശ്രേയയെ കാണുവാൻ അവർ നാലുപേരും ചേർന്ന് ഗോവയിൽ വരുമ്പോൾ ചില അപ്രതീക്ഷിത സംഭവങ്ങൾ ഉണ്ടാകുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: Role Models
generalInfo.description: Gowtham and his college friends tread different paths after an untoward incident makes him antisocial. His parents then try to contact his friends in order to help him.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Life of Ayaan, a man with a traumatizing past, changes when he meets Isha, a painter. However, his happiness is short-lived as his past haunts him.
generalInfo.alterDescription: വേദനിപ്പിക്കുന്ന ഭൂതകാലം വേട്ടയാടുന്നതിനിടയില്‍ ഒരു ആശ്വാസമെന്നോണം അയാന്‍ പെയിന്‍ററായ ഇഷയെ പരിചയപ്പെടുന്നു. എന്നാല്‍ അതിനു ആയുസ് കുറവായിരുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: Lavender
generalInfo.description: Life of Ayaan, a man with a traumatizing past, changes when he meets Isha, a painter. However, his happiness is short-lived as his past haunts him.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Amminippilla is left helpless when his family fixes his marriage with Kanthi. He detests his wife from the start and approaches a lawyer, Pradeepan, to file for divorce.
generalInfo.alterDescription: അമ്മിണിപ്പിള്ള നല്ല വിനയമുള്ള ഒരു ചെറുപ്പക്കാരൻ ആണ്. അയാളുടെ ജീവിതത്തിൽ നടന്നുകൊണ്ടിരിക്കുന്ന എല്ലാ കാര്യങ്ങളും നിശ്ചയിക്കുന്നത് കുടുംബക്കാർ തന്നെയാണ്. അമ്മിണിപ്പിള്ളയുടെ ഇഷ്ടം ചോദിക്കാതെ അവർ എല്ലാവരും ചേർന്ന് അയാളുടെ കല്യാണം ആലോചിക്കുന്നു. അഡ്വക്കേറ്റ് പ്രദീപൻ്റെ സഹായത്തോടെ കുടുംബക്കാർ എടുത്ത തീരുമാനത്തെ അമ്മിണിപ്പിള്ള കോടതിയിൽ ചോദ്യം ചെയ്യുന്നു.
generalInfo.title: O.P.160/18 Kakshi: Amminippilla
generalInfo.description: Amminippilla is left helpless when his family fixes his marriage with Kanthi. He detests his wife from the start and approaches a lawyer, Pradeepan, to file for divorce.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Shivamma, a resilient matriarch in a struggling household, is an enthusiastic sales representative for an energy drink brand. With kindness & grit, she is determined to build a better life & stand out to those who dismiss her as just a 'mere woman'.

generalInfo.description: Shivamma, a resilient matriarch in a struggling household, is an enthusiastic sales representative for an energy drink brand. With kindness & grit, she is determined to build a better life & stand out to those who dismiss her as just a 'mere woman'.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Santosh, a carefree youth, parts ways with his lover, Dharmika, during his college days. Years later, he runs into her, which leaves him in splits.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ಸಂತೋಷ್, ' ಈ ಜಗತ್ತಿನಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರೀತಿ ಅನ್ನೋದು ಇಲ್ಲ ಇರೋದು ಕೇವಲ ಕಾಮ ಮಾತ್ರ ' ಎಂದು ನಂಬಿದ್ದಾನೆ . ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ತನ್ನ ಪಿ. ಎಚ್ ಡಿ ಗೆ 'ಪ್ರೀತಿ' ವಿಷಯವನ್ನು ಆಯ್ಕೆ ಮಾಡುತ್ತಾಳೆ  . ಸಂತೋಷ್ ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ಕಾಲೇಜಿನ ದಿನಗಳಲ್ಲಿ ಪ್ರೀತಿಸಿ ಕಾರಣಾoತರಗಳಿಂದ ಬೇರ್ಪಟ್ಟಿದ್ದಾರೆ . ಧಾರ್ಮಿಕ ಮತ್ತೆ ಸಂತೋಷ್ ಜೀವನದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಂದು ಅವನಿಗೆ ಪ್ರೀತಿಯ ಬಗ್ಗೆ ಇರುವ ಅಭಿಪ್ರಾಯ ಬದಲಾಯಿಸುತ್ತಾಳೆ
generalInfo.title: I Love You (2019)
generalInfo.description: Santosh, a carefree youth, parts ways with his lover, Dharmika, during his college days. Years later, he runs into her, which leaves him in splits.

generalInfo.briefDescription: Krishna, a middle-class guy is in love with Geeta. Geeta can't accept him due to poverty and is forced to elope with Narendra, a rich hotelier. Tragedy strikes when Narendra dies in a bike accident.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ಈ ಚಿತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಾಯಕಿ ರಾಧೀಕ ಹಾಗೂ ನಾಯಕ ಅಜಯ್ ರಾವ್ ಇಬ್ಬರೂ ಸಾಧಾರಣ ಕುಟುಂಬಕ್ಕೆ ಸೇರಿದವರಾಗಿರುತ್ತಾರೆ.ಆದರೆ ನಾಯಕಿಗೆ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಬದುಕಿನ ಮೇಲೆ ವ್ಯಾಮೋಹವಿದ್ದರೂ,ಬಡವನಾಗಿದ್ದ ನಾಯನನ್ನು ಪ್ರೀತಿಸುತ್ತಾಳೆ.ಈ ನಡುವೆ ನಾಯಕಿಯ ತಾಯಿಗೆ ಹೃದಯಾಘಾತವಾಗಿ ಜನರಿಗೆ ಕೊಡಬೇಕಿದ್ದ ಲಕ್ಷಾಂತರ ಚೀಟಿ ಹಣ ಚಿಕಿತ್ಸೆಗೆ ಖರ್ಚಾಗುತ್ತದೆ.ಇದನ್ನು ನಿಭಾಯಿಸಲು ಆಕೆ ಶ್ರೀಮಂತ ಗೆಳೆಯನನ್ನು ಒಲ್ಲದ ಮನಸ್ಸಿನಿಂದ ಮದುವೆಯಾಗುತ್ತಾಳೆ.ಆದರೆ ಆತನೂ ಅಪಘಾತದಲ್ಲಿ ಸಾವನ್ನಪ್ಪುತ್ತಾನೆ.ಕೊನೆಗೆ ನಾಯಕಿ ಏನಾಗುತ್ತಾಳೆ ಎಂಬುದು ಈ ಚಿತ್ರದ ಕಥೆ.
generalInfo.title: Krishnan Love Story
generalInfo.description: Krishna, a middle-class guy is in love with Geeta. Geeta can't accept him due to poverty and is forced to elope with Narendra, a rich hotelier. Tragedy strikes when Narendra dies in a bike accident.

values.description: Suitable for viewers age above 13 only
values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for viewers age above 13 only

generalInfo.briefDescription: Nandeesha, a gambler and drinker, falls in love with Nethra, who belongs to a rival village. He then decides to elope with her but has to deal with the rivalry between their communities.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ಕಿರಾತಕ ಚಿತ್ರವು  ತಮಿಳು ಚಿತ್ರದ  ಕಳವಾಣಿ ಚಿತ್ರದ  ರಿಮೇಕ್ ಆಗಿದೆ .ಕಿರಾತಕ ಚಿತ್ರ ಎರಡು ಹಳ್ಳಿಗಳ ಜಿದ್ದಾ ಜಿದ್ಧುಗಾಲ ಮದ್ಯೆ ಮೂಡುವ ಪ್ರೇಮ ಕಥೆ. ಈ ಚಿತ್ರದಲ್ಲಿ ನಾಯಕ ಯಶ್ ಹಾಗು ನಾಯಕಿ ನೇತ್ರಾ ಪರಸ್ಪರ ಪ್ರೀತಿಸುತ್ಥಾರೆ. ಆದರೆ ಈ ಮದುವೆ ನಾಯಕಿಯ ಮನೆಯವರಿಗೆ ಇಷ್ಟವಿರುವುದಿಲ್ಲ. ಹೀಗಾಗಿ ನಾಯಕ ನಾಯಕಿಯನ್ನು ಮದುವೆಯಾಗಲು ಮಾಡುವ ಕಿತಾಪತಿಯೇ ಈ ಚಿತ್ರದ ಕಥೆ.
generalInfo.title: Kiraathaka
generalInfo.description: Nandeesha, a gambler and drinker, falls in love with Nethra, who belongs to a rival village. He then decides to elope with her but has to deal with the rivalry between their communities.

values.description: Suitable for viewers age above 13 only
values.name: cbfcRatingOTT
values.title: Suitable for viewers age above 13 only

generalInfo.briefDescription: A young man falls in love with Lalitha and convinces his uncle to meet her. However, on the day of the meeting, Lalitha leaves for Mumbai.
generalInfo.alterDescription: ಇದೊಂದು ಹಾಸ್ಯಭರಿತ ಚಿತ್ರವಾಗಿದೆ. ಈ ಚಿತ್ರವು ಇಬ್ಬರು ಗೆಳೆಯರ ನಡುವಿನ ಕಥೆಯಾಗಿದೆ. ಇದರಲ್ಲಿ ಒಬ್ಬ ಗೆಳೆಯ ಒಂದು ವ್ಯವಹಾರ ಆರಂಭಿಸುತ್ತಾನೆ, ಆದರೆ ಅದರಲ್ಲಿ ಸಾಕಷ್ಟು ನಷ್ಟ ಅನುಭವಿಸುತ್ತಾನೆ. ಹೀಗಾಗಿ ಆತ ಜ್ಯೋತಿಷಿಯ ಮೊರೆ ಹೋಗುತ್ತಾನೆ. ಆ ಜ್ಯೋತಿಷಿ ನಕ್ಷತ್ರದ ಮಚ್ಚೆ ಇರುವ ಹುಡುಗಿಯನ್ನು ಮದುವೆಯಾದರೆ ಒಳ್ಳೆಯದಾಗುತ್ತದೆ ಎಂದು ಹೇಳುತ್ತಾನೆ. ನಂತರ ನಾಯಕ ಶರಣ್ ನಕ್ಷತ್ರದ ಮಚ್ಚೆ ಇರುವ ಹುಡುಗಿಯ ವೇಷದಲ್ಲಿ ಬಂದು ಎಲ್ಲರನ್ನೂ ನಗಿಸುವುದು ಈ ಚಿತ್ರದ ಕಥೆ.
generalInfo.title: Jai Lalitha
generalInfo.description: A young man falls in love with Lalitha and convinces his uncle to meet her. However, on the day of the meeting, Lalitha leaves for Mumbai.
